title: UK Parliament takes major step towards crypto regulatory clarity
description: Lawmakers in the upper house of the United Kingdom’s Parliament are pushing forward with legislation that aims to support the adoption of cryptocurrencies in the country. During a meeting on June 19, members of the U.K. Parliament’s House of Lords expressed their support for the Financial Services and Markets Bill, which seeks to strengthen the ... Read more

title: Delio to resume withdrawals after shocking suspension
description: According to a recent report from Decenter, a local news outlet, Delio, a prominent South Korean crypto lending platform, has announced that it will resume withdrawals after temporarily suspending them on June 14. However, the platform has not provided a fixed schedule for the withdrawals.  In a meeting held with investors on June 17, Delio’s ... Read more

title: BNB Chain Rolls Out Testnet for New Ethereum Compatible Layer-2 Solution
description:
Binance’s BNB Chain (BNB) is launching a testnet for an Ethereum (ETH)-compatible layer-2 solution called opBNB. According to a new BNB ChainÂ announcement, opBNB’s testnet, which is based on the Optimism OP Stack, is launching today and aims to address scalability issues. “opBNB is BSC’s (Binance Smart Chain) answer to the scalability challenge that has limited […]

The post BNB Chain Rolls Out Testnet for New Ethereum Compatible Layer-2 Solution appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
